Articles.Content:
I recently picked a guf as my profile pic. The day I added that, the pic showed up on all my posts.

Now, it only shows up on my profile edit page but not on any of my posts.
That's a little weird. You need to set it as your Avatar for it to show up on posts -- Profile Picture, as the name implies, should only appear on your profile page.
also of note if you ever do try to find a gif for your avatar, It must be no larger than 19.5 kb and 64x64 pixels.
